duties_responsibilities.duty: Investigate and determine the origin and cause of claims by contacting appropriate parties and identifying complex issues.
Handle both 1st party and 3rd party claims under multiple policy types and numerous endorsements.
Conduct on-site inspections, evaluate damages, and negotiate claims with insureds, claimants, attorneys, and public adjusters.
Respond to customer inquiries, interpret policies and apply coverages to all parties for assigned losses.

education_certification.credential: Valid driver's license and state-specific property casualty claims licensing
